meanings.definition: Resembling spinach in appearance or taste.
meanings.sent1: The spinachlike leaves were vibrant green and full of nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The salad had a spinachlike flavor that reminded me of a garden.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a spinachlike superhero after eating my greens.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a spinachlike freshness.
meanings.sent5: The spinachlike smoothie was a refreshing treat on a hot day.
